title: Add a listing to your watchlist
description: Adds a listing to the authenticated user's watchlist. Alternatively see the Add a listing to your watchlist with options endpoint for more options.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: listingId
path.description: The ID of the listing to add to the watchlist.

returns.description: <WatchListResponse> Details on whether the operation succeeded.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
